Text: Thanks artpepper for this great book.If only all the illustrations had been in colour,it would have been so much easier to identify these numerous amazing plants.But thanks all the same.
Sorry about that @indiaman but I imagine this volume is better as a desk reference than as a field guide...
Thanks.My daughter has been looking for this.
Thank you very much.  Nice to find a good and useful book in between all the junk floating around the internet ;)
